titleStmt.title: A plea for Mr Strong's church-members; shewing they ought not implicitely to submit to his unnecessary and doubtful rules, although for it he threaten to debar them from the Lords Table, or to leave them altogether. / By Thomas Bakewell.
titleStmt.author: Bakewell, Thomas, b. 1618 or 19.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Dallom, and are to be sold at his shop in black Fryers, neer Carter-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in black Fryers, neer Carter-lane
